resources.string: NDK text relocations have been disabled in Android 10
Build Serial only available for system apps on Android 10+
Build Serial only available after Android Oreo
getConnectionOwnerUid not implemented on Android 9 and lower
Text from the file in external storage will be here after you press the button.
On devices with Android 9 or lower you have to give a permission to read app media files since scoped storage was not really a thing
Since Android 10, you will be requested a separate permission for background location
You shouldn\'t see any permission requests
Bionic libraries use symbolic links as paths
Binaries are in execute-only memory now
You can read executable binary files content
Since Android 10, TLS 1.3 is enabled by default
You should see TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256 cypher suite
Starting with Android 10 TLS cypher suites cannot be customized, so you should see the one chosen by system
Press this button to establish TLS connection
Press this button to connect to the hotspot
To test it you will need two devices. You start the hotspot on first device, and on the second one input its ssid it the field below and connect to it
Press this button to start hotspot
Android 10 introduced new API for establishing WiFi Peer to Peer connections
You have connected to the suggested network!
You should see a notification or an alert dialog, depending on your phone version. Note that your phone isnt forced to connect to a suggested network - the decision is on OS to make
Android 10 introduced new API for suggesting WiFi networks
